```{r pancreas 32248378, include=FALSE}

PMID_32248378 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('32248378', database = 'PubMed')

citation_32248378 <- paste0(PMID_32248378$journal,' ', PMID_32248378$year, ' ', PMID_32248378$month,';', PMID_32248378$volume,'(', PMID_32248378$number,'):', PMID_32248378$pages)

PubMed_32248378 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_32248378$eprint)

doi_32248378 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_32248378$doi)

Sys.sleep(1)

```
